# Optical absorption spectrum of Program fragment delivered error ``Can't call method "sample_" on an undefined value at abs.template line 1.'':LISAF (Cr:LiSrAlF6)
# assuming unity concentration per meter.  This data was part of the NASA 
# Laser Spectra Database found on the web until December of 2005 which
# was created by Pat Cross working at NASA Langley Research Center, Internal
# Operations Group, Aerospace Electronics Systems Division, Remote Sensing.
#
# The spectra was collected by DJR on 16 October 1994 and was 
# annotated on 16 October 1994.  The sample name was "" was a 2.1400
# long piece of :.   
# The incident light had P-polarization.
#
# Spectra were recorded from 300 to 900nm
# every 1nm at room temperature.
#
# FILE NAME ON PC = lisaf2.dx NO_POINTS = 601. pts DATA_INTV = .001000 µm MIN_LAMBDA = .300000 µm MIN_DATA = .15920 MAX_LAMBDA = .900000 µm MAX_DATA = .92930 SCANSPEED = 60.000000 nm/min SLITWIDTH= 1.00000 nm RESP TIME = .5 sec SENSITIVITY = 2 DATE=94/10/16 vertical polorization No correction for index since index for LiSAF not in table. Following corrections made using the PLOT program: C 1; M(900.nM,0.9293) R; M(350.nM,0.8009 L; S M; T1; U; W.
#
